p: The materialâ€™s textural properties are summarized in Table 3. CK materials were exclusively microporous, their micropore volume (V micro) represented approximately 80% of V 0.95, while CP materials were micro and mesoporous; V micro and V meso each represented 50% of V 0.95. The CP samples exhibited a significantly higher V 0.95 than the CK samples. The difference between mesoporous volume by BHJ method (V meso) and mesoporous volume by porosimetry method (V 2) indicated that, for all materials, the mesopores were between 2 and 6.5 nm.
